title: Flex alignment modes for layout
description: Add Flex enum to control excess space distribution in layouts. Modes: Start, End, Center, SpaceBetween, SpaceAround, SpaceEvenly. Currently only Legacy-style (excess in final element) is supported. See FEATURES_GAP.md P0 priority.

title: Calendar widget
description: Monthly calendar display widget. Renders a month view with dates, day headers, and optional event markers. Niche use case, medium effort. See FEATURES_GAP.md P3 priority.

title: Hidden text attribute
description: Add Style.hidden() attribute support. Rarely used text attribute that renders characters as invisible (for password fields etc). Low effort. See FEATURES_GAP.md P3 priority.

title: Chart: Axis rendering
description: Axis rendering for Chart widget. Includes: X/Y axis lines, tick marks, numeric labels, axis titles. Handles auto-scaling of value ranges.

title: Chart: Line dataset
description: Line dataset rendering for Chart widget. Connects data points with lines. Supports multiple datasets with different styles/colors.

title: Padding and Margin types
description: Add Padding and Margin struct types for layout convenience. Currently users must calculate insets manually via Rect math. Include: Padding (per-side values), Margin (uniform or per-side), Spacing (inter-element gaps). See FEATURES_GAP.md P1 priority.

title: Canvas: Shape trait
description: Shape interface for Canvas extensibility. Allow users to implement custom shapes by providing a draw(context) method. Enables domain-specific visualizations.

title: Percentage layout constraint
description: Add Constraint.percentage(n) for percentage-based layout allocation. Currently can be approximated with ratio(n, 100) but dedicated percentage is more convenient. See FEATURES_GAP.md P0 priority.

title: Tree widget
description: Hierarchical data display widget. Renders tree structures with expandable/collapsible nodes, indentation, and connection lines. See FEATURES_GAP.md P2 priority.

title: CodeEditor widget
description: Syntax-highlighted code editor widget. Very specialized widget with syntax highlighting, line numbers, and editing capabilities. Would require tree-sitter or similar integration. Very high effort, low priority. See FEATURES_GAP.md P3 priority.

title: Canvas: Circle shape
description: Circle shape for Canvas widget. Parameters: center (x, y), radius, color. Uses Bresenham circle algorithm for rendering.

title: LineGauge widget
description: Thin-line progress indicator widget. Renders progress as a single thin line rather than a full block. Low effort variant of existing Gauge widget. See FEATURES_GAP.md P2 priority.

title: Canvas: Line shape
description: Line shape for Canvas widget. Parameters: start (x1, y1), end (x2, y2), color. Uses Bresenham line algorithm for rendering.

title: Canvas: Rectangle shape
description: Rectangle shape for Canvas widget. Parameters: x, y, width, height, color. Optional fill vs outline mode.

title: Canvas widget
description: Arbitrary shape drawing widget. Provides a coordinate-based drawing surface for rendering shapes using terminal characters. High effort. Subtasks: Circle, Line, Rectangle, Points, Map, Label, custom Shape trait. See FEATURES_GAP.md P2 priority.

title: Chart widget (line graphs)
description: Line graph and scatter plot widget with axes. Renders datasets as line graphs or scatter plots with configurable axes, labels, and styling. High effort due to axis scaling and rendering complexity. See FEATURES_GAP.md P1 priority.

title: BigText widget
description: Large pixel text widget. Renders text using 8x8 bitmap font glyphs for decorative headers and splash screens. Purely decorative, low priority. See FEATURES_GAP.md P3 priority.

title: BarChart widget
description: Grouped bar chart widget for data visualization. Displays multiple datasets as vertical bars with optional grouping, labels, and styling. Medium effort, high impact for dashboards and monitoring tools. See FEATURES_GAP.md P1 priority.

title: Sparkline widget
description: Compact inline data visualization widget. Renders a series of values as vertical bars within a single line. Low effort, high impact for data visualization use cases. See FEATURES_GAP.md P0 priority.

title: Canvas: Points shape
description: Scatter points shape for Canvas widget. Parameters: array of (x, y) coordinates, color. For scatter plot visualization.

title: Chart: Scatter dataset
description: Scatter plot dataset rendering for Chart widget. Renders data points as individual markers without connecting lines.

title: Menu widget
description: Nested menu navigation widget. Renders hierarchical menu structures with keyboard navigation support. See FEATURES_GAP.md P2 priority.
